job_tasks.phrase: Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to working with LLMs and creating AI features, which falls under the core of model development and application.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop AI-Powered Web Applications: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of building and integrating AI into web applications, encompassing both front-end and back-end development.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This reinforces the need for full-stack software development skills to build integrated solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a need for full-cycle software development, from conceptualization to product delivery, using AI and full-stack skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Your work will directly impact thousands of students, ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to understand the business context and align technical solutions with user needs and strategic goals in educational technology.

job_tasks.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product. Your work will directly impact thousands of students, ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology.
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly mentioning MLOps tools, 'taking ownership of the entire product' and 'launching and iterating on products' implies responsibilities related to productionizing and maintaining AI applications.

job_tasks.phrase: create autonomous tools and interactive features
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly points to the creation and implementation of AI-driven functionalities.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_tasks.justification: This task emphasizes understanding the business goal of accelerating learning outcomes and efficiency for students, requiring alignment of technical solutions with these objectives.

soft_skills.phrase: This is not a position for those who prefer to specialize in a single aspect of development. We're looking for innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product.
Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.

Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.

You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Large Language Models (LLMs) like GPT-4 and Claude to create interactive AI features and autonomous tools. It also stresses the development of user-facing applications and the integration of AI across front-end and back-end systems, aligning perfectly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
